A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie showed the downs\, the efforts\, the hopes and the rise after falling of characters from which we can be inspired from.
Changes things? Sure
But doesn't kill the tradition
Some people say it doesn't answer all questions but they need to understand that it is a trilogy
You can't answer all questions in 1 film
Overall its a EPIC film
One of the generations best
10/10
